star_players.name: Morg 'n' Thorg
special_abilities: The Ballista: Once per game, when Morg performs a Throw Team-Mate action, increase the range by 1 category.

star_players.name: Griff Oberwald
special_abilities: Consummate Professional: Once per game, Griff may re-roll one dice that was rolled either as a single dice roll or as part of a dice pool.

star_players.name: Hakflem Skuttlespike
special_abilities: Treacherous: Once per game, when an opposition player is activated, Hakflem may immediately move up to 3 squares.

star_players.name: Varag Ghoul-Chewer
special_abilities: Crushing Blow: Once per game, when Varag makes a Block action, you may add +1 to the Armour roll and +1 to the Injury roll.

star_players.name: Deeproot Strongbranch
special_abilities: Reliable: Deeproot has a Loner (4+) trait rather than (4+) and may re-roll the dice if Loner fails.

star_players.name: Kreek Rustgouger
special_abilities: Whirling Dervish: When Kreek moves, he may choose to change his facing after each square of movement.

star_players.name: Roxanna Darknail
special_abilities: Burst of Speed: Once per game, Roxanna may increase her MA by +2 for an entire activation.

star_players.name: Grim Ironjaw
special_abilities: Slayer: Once per game, when Grim makes a Block action, you may choose to make it a -2 Dice block.

star_players.name: Zug
special_abilities: Crushing Blow: Once per game, when Zug makes a Block action, you may choose to double the Strength of Zug for the purpose of determining dice.

star_players.name: Wilhelm Chaney
special_abilities: Savage Mauling: Once per game, after Wilhelm has made a successful Block, you may choose to make a second Block action immediately.

star_players.name: Bomber Dribblesnot
special_abilities: Kaboom!: Bomber's bombs have a +1 modifier to the Armour roll and a +1 modifier to the Injury roll.

star_players.name: Ripper Bolgrot
special_abilities: Throw Team-Mate: Ripper may throw team-mates as if they were the ball. He is Really Stupid though!

star_players.name: Karla Von Kill
special_abilities: Indomitable: Once per game, Karla may re-roll any one dice.

star_players.name: Helmut Wulf
special_abilities: Old Pro: When rolling to see if Helmut is Sent Off, roll 2D6 and pick the highest.

star_players.name: Glart Smashrip
special_abilities: Frenzied Rush: Once per game, Glart may make a second Blitz action.

star_players.name: Eldril Sidewinder
special_abilities: Mesmerizing Dance: Once per game, Eldril may move up to 3 squares at the start of any opposition turn.

star_players.name: Mighty Zug
special_abilities: The Wall: Once per game, Mighty Zug may force an opposing player to reroll a Block dice.

star_players.name: Skitter Stab-Stab
special_abilities: Sneaky Stab: Once per game, when Skitter uses his Stab skill, he may re-roll the Armour roll.

star_players.name: Lord Borak the Despoiler
special_abilities: Lord of Chaos: Once per game, Lord Borak may force the referee to look the other way during a foul.

star_players.name: Fungus the Loon
special_abilities: Whirling Death: Fungus hits everything in his path, friend or foe!

star_players.name: Count Luthor Von Drakenborg
special_abilities: The Lord of the Night: Once per game, Count Luthor may regenerate automatically without rolling.

star_players.name: Grak and Crumbleberry
special_abilities: Two for One: Grak comes with Crumbleberry, a Halfling who rides on his shoulders.

star_players.name: Rashnak Backstabber
special_abilities: Assassination: Once per game, Rashnak's Stab gains +2 to the Armour roll.

star_players.name: Barik Farblast
special_abilities: Cannonball: Barik's thrown ball can injure players it hits!

star_players.name: Scrappa Sorehead
special_abilities: Yoink!: Once per game, Scrappa may pick up the ball in any square he moves through.

star_players.name: Akhorne the Squirrel
special_abilities: Furry Fury: Akhorne can re-roll failed Dauntless rolls.
